Assault.display_help: While this power is active, you and your nearby teammates deal more damage.
Assault.display_target_help: Your attack damage is improved due to good leadership and teamwork.
Assault.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's damage potential

Maneuvers.display_help: A good leader knows how to protect his team. While active, this power increases the Defense of yourself and all nearby teammates.
Maneuvers.display_target_help: Your Defense is improved due to good teamwork and leadership.
Maneuvers.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's Defense with good {PowerName}.

Tactics.display_help: While this power is active, your Accuracy and that of all your nearby teammates' is increased. Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse effects, as well as your Perception so you can detect Stealthy foes. You must be at least leve
Tactics.display_target_help: Your Accuracy and Perception is improved due to good teamwork and Leadership.
Tactics.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's Accuracy and Perception.
